prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
AMAR GAJABAR K
Consultant
Phone: 7795953813
Mail id: amargke@gmail.com
Summary
Seeking a challenging career in an esteemed organization to grow professionally by strengthening my technical and analytical skills, and earning good reputation with which I work, always keeping in mind the goals of the organization as the prime objective.
Education
Graduated in Bachelor of Engineering in 2017 from Visveswaraya Technological University, Alva’s Institute of Engineering and Technology, Mijar, Moodbidri with overall aggregate of 67.5 %
Skills
SQL | ETL Testing | BI Testing | DWH Testing | Microsoft sql server management studio (SSMS) | Oracle 10g/11g |Snowflake | Unix | JIRA  | Confluence
Profile Summary
Having 5.10 years of experience in Software Testing, involving analysis of ETL Testing.
Experience in ETL/DWH Testing/Power BI Testing using SQL in  SSMS and Snowflake 
Good knowledge in creating Test Scenarios, Test Cases and Defect Management, to ensure the test all the business requirements.
Good understanding of Data Warehouse concepts (Star Schema, Snowflake Schema, Dimension table, Fact table, Data Mart).
Knowledge about business transformations logics.
Extensive testing ETL experience using ADF,SQL Server, Snowflake
Experience in using Defect Tracking Tool like JIRA.
Good knowledge about testing in SSMS,Snowflake
Good knowledge about Agile scrum for Project environment.
Excellent communication & team building skills with proficiency at grasping new technical concepts quickly & utilize the same in a productive manner.
Excellent team player with an ability to perform individually, good interpersonal and analytical skills.
Good communication, motivation skills, Strong Analytical skills and interpersonal skills.
Work Experience
Currently working with Capgemini Technology Services India Limited as a Consultant from January 2022 to till date
Previously worked in DSI Technologies Pvt Ltd from January -2019 to January- 2022 
Projects
    Project 1    : Data Platform (DPF)
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
